title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 19.3 - Use of bait fish
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 19.3 - Use of bait fish

State Regulations

No person shall use fish as bait for angling in the waters
of the State, other than in the marine and coastal district, except as provided
in section
19.2
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
19.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
